channel.title: Adding Admin
channel.description: I just downloaded Rune-Evo,searched all in the topic how to add Admin/moderator there,Nothing works,Any help can be really helpfull. ;)

item.title: Adding Admin
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

If the server doesn’t already have a player rights system, you will have to create your own. There are several options you can choose from; you could make an enum, array, or simply create a variable for each player right there, which I highly suggest you don’t use.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Admin
item.dc:creator: @Maddogrun1 Maddogrun1
item.description:
@Maddogrun1 wrote:

Well it depends, what type of server is it, like a 317, or a 400something, or a 667, or up?
Because on the 667+ i believe, it’s in player.java. Search for playerrights = 7 or something like that, or if you know the owners name then search for that. then just change your name.
On the older 317s you would edit the character files.

Read full topic
